A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was very boring. I absolutely cannot stand Rey. Her character is so flat and not well developed at all. This movie also lacked the action scenes that made the past Star Wars movies great. I did not like what they made Luke Skywalker into either. This was the worst installment in the franchise since The Phantom Menace. Rian Johnson should not be allowed to direct another Star Wars movie again
